summary: Users reporting app crash on login screen after update
description: Multiple customer reports via App Store and social channels indicate the app crashes immediately upon tapping 'Sign in' after the latest release.

summary: iOS NullPointerException in AuthController during sign-in
description: Crash logs from Sentry show a NullPointerException in AuthController.handleSignIn() on iOS 17 devices. Reproducible when biometric auth is enabled.

summary: Dashboard loading is extremely slow for enterprise users
description: Enterprise customers report 8â€“12 second load times on the dashboard during peak hours. Suspected bottleneck in aggregated analytics queries.

summary: Optimize DB query performance for /dashboard endpoint
description: Investigate N+1 queries and missing indexes used by the /dashboard endpoint. Add query plan analysis and implement caching where appropriate.

summary: Add Dark Mode support to mobile app
description: Customers frequently request Dark Mode across the mobile experience. Define UX patterns and acceptance criteria for a system-level theme toggle.
Introduce theme tokens and update components to support Dark Mode. Ensure accessible color contrast ratios (WCAG AA).

summary: Q1 campaign brief for enterprise segment
description: Develop campaign positioning, target personas, and key messaging for the Q1 enterprise pipeline acceleration campaign.
Audit keyword gaps, update meta tags, improve internal linking, and add schema markup to increase organic traffic.
Coordinate with Customer Success to produce a case study highlighting 35% reduction in onboarding time.

summary: Update brand guidelines for social media
description: Define new templates for short-form video, carousel posts, and announcement graphics with updated color palette.

summary: Add integration tests for auth flows
description: Create end-to-end tests covering email/password, SSO (SAML/OIDC), and biometric login with mocked IdP responses.
Add symbolication for iOS and Proguard mapping upload for Android to improve stack trace readability in Sentry.

summary: Define success metrics for onboarding redesign
description: Partner with Data to define activation rate, TTFV, and week-4 retention as primary KPIs for onboarding changes.
Score potential initiatives using RICE and align with GTM on launch dependencies.
Create migration plan to v2 webhooks, communicate timeline to customers, and provide API compatibility layer.
